AD_ALERTRULE.NAME: Wrong Matched Invoice posting. Wrong account.
CUSTOMER WITHOUT ACCOUNTING
AD_ALERTRULE.SQL: SELECT DISTINCT BP.C_BPARTNER_ID AS REFERENCEKEY_ID, '0' AS AD_ROLE_ID, NULL AS AD_USER_ID, 'CUSTOMER WITHOUT ACCOUNTING' AS DESCRIPTION, 'Y' AS ISACTIVE, BP.AD_ORG_ID AS AD_ORG_ID, BP.AD_CLIENT_ID AS AD_CLIENT_ID, NOW() AS CREATED, '0' AS CREATEDBY, NOW() AS UPDATED, '0' AS UPDATEDBY, AD_COLUMN_IDENTIFIER('C_BPartner', BP.C_BPARTNER_ID, 'en_US') AS RECORD_ID FROM C_BPARTNER BP, (SELECT C_ACCTSCHEMA_ID, AD_ORG_ID, AD_CLIENT_ID FROM AD_ORG_ACCTSCHEMA) A WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM C_BP_CUSTOMER_ACCT WHERE BP.C_BPARTNER_ID = C_BP_CUSTOMER_ACCT.C_BPARTNER_ID AND C_ACCTSCHEMA_ID = A.C_ACCTSCHEMA_ID AND C_BP_CUSTOMER_ACCT.ISACTIVE = 'Y' ) AND (AD_ISORGINCLUDED(A.AD_ORG_ID, BP.AD_ORG_ID, BP.AD_CLIENT_ID)<>-1 OR AD_ISORGINCLUDED(BP.AD_ORG_ID, A.AD_ORG_ID, BP.AD_CLIENT_ID)<>-1) AND A.AD_CLIENT_ID = BP.AD_CLIENT_ID AND BP.ISACTIVE = 'Y' AND A.AD_CLIENT_ID = '23C59575B9CF467C9620760EB255B389'

AD_ALERTRULE.NAME: Payment to be paid for Purchase Invoice
AD_ALERTRULE.SQL: SELECT i.c_invoice_id AS referencekey_id, ad_column_identifier('C_Invoice',i.c_invoice_id,'en_US') AS record_id, 0 AS ad_role_id, NULL AS ad_user_id, ad_column_identifier('C_Invoice',i.c_invoice_id,'en_US') ||' outstanding amount Rs.'||ps.outstandingamt|| (case when trunc(ps.duedate) = trunc(now()) then ' is planned to be paid today' else ' was planned to be paid '||(to_char(round(to_number(now()- ps.duedate))))||' days ago' end) as description, 'Y' AS isActive, i.ad_org_id, i.ad_client_id, now() AS created, 0 AS createdBy, now() AS updated, 0 AS updatedBy FROM c_invoice i JOIN fin_payment_schedule ps ON ps.c_invoice_id = i.c_invoice_id WHERE i.processed = 'Y' AND i.ad_client_Id = '23C59575B9CF467C9620760EB255B389' AND trunc(duedate)<= trunc(now()) AND issotrx='N' AND ispaid='N' AND ps.outstandingamt> 0

AD_ALERTRULE.NAME: G/L ITEM WITHOUT ACCOUNTING
AD_ALERTRULE.SQL: SELECT DISTINCT GL.C_GLITEM_ID AS REFERENCEKEY_ID, '0' AS AD_ROLE_ID, NULL AS AD_USER_ID, 'G/L ITEM WITHOUT ACCOUNTING' AS DESCRIPTION, 'Y' AS ISACTIVE, GL.AD_ORG_ID AS AD_ORG_ID, GL.AD_CLIENT_ID AS AD_CLIENT_ID, NOW() AS CREATED, '0' AS CREATEDBY, NOW() AS UPDATED, '0' AS UPDATEDBY, AD_COLUMN_IDENTIFIER('C_GLITEM', GL.C_GLITEM_ID, 'en_US') AS RECORD_ID FROM C_GLITEM GL, (SELECT C_ACCTSCHEMA_ID, AD_ORG_ID, AD_CLIENT_ID FROM AD_ORG_ACCTSCHEMA) A WHERE NOT EXISTS (SELECT 1 FROM C_GLITEM_ACCT WHERE GL.C_GLITEM_ID = C_GLITEM_ACCT.C_GLITEM_ID AND C_ACCTSCHEMA_ID = A.C_ACCTSCHEMA_ID AND C_GLITEM_ACCT.ISACTIVE = 'Y' ) AND (AD_ISORGINCLUDED(A.AD_ORG_ID, GL.AD_ORG_ID, GL.AD_CLIENT_ID)<>-1 OR AD_ISORGINCLUDED(GL.AD_ORG_ID, A.AD_ORG_ID, GL.AD_CLIENT_ID)<>-1) AND A.AD_CLIENT_ID = GL.AD_CLIENT_ID AND A.AD_CLIENT_ID = '23C59575B9CF467C9620760EB255B389' AND GL.ISACTIVE = 'Y'

AD_ALERTRULE.NAME: Wrong Matched Invoice posting. Wrong currency conversion.
Alert Taxes: Inversión del Sujeto Pasivo
AD_ALERTRULE.SQL: SELECT t.C_Tax_ID AS referencekey_id, t.Name AS record_id, 0 AS ad_role_id, NULL AS ad_user_id, 'En la versión 1.2.24 del módulo de impuestos para España, este impuesto fue sustituido por dos impuestos que diferencian transacciones desde países de la Unión Europea o de fuera de la UE. En sus sistema se encuentran documentos contabilizados con este impuesto. Es muy importante que descontabilice esos documentos y que sustituya el impuesto de Inversión de Sujeto Pasivo por el nuevo que corresponda y vuelva a contabilizar el documento. Para saber los documentos que están afectados, vea las Referencias a ese impuesto desde la ventana de configuración del impuesto' AS description, 'Y' AS isActive, 0 AS ad_org_id, t.ad_client_id AS ad_client_id, now() AS created, 0 AS createdBy, now() AS updated, 0 AS updatedBy FROM C_Tax t JOIN AD_REF_DATA_LOADED tm ON (t.c_tax_id=tm.specific_id) JOIN FACT_ACCT f ON (f.c_tax_id=tm.specific_id) WHERE tm.generic_id in ('0526654C55DD439BBF9432E00100494E', '10FCE3C3A4A24C3BB2D2E0423658D52E', '18D8A018FDED40EC9AAC800B73A39925', '2DE7B2012FD143649C11333CB26BB32F', '3A09347CF4A14830953EC8EF7A380F87', '46CAB684FA0B45729B75E8093F2AB3DF', '9BD28CCE1393432FB4A5164260CC1BA4', '9EC77D1C2FCA4B4983EF726DFC8BD385', 'A3B447E7596F4CB3A4C2CAE57D5C25E1', 'A9E786694E6C41289AF29E89D728B453', 'ABA548810F4D42C9A421CA91058431F9', 'CCF5F4991F254403993B767166214DDB', 'F123F6214D244778A051122CC574E4B9', 'FF80818123B7FC160123B804AB8A0011', 'FF80818123B7FC160123B804AB8E0022', 'FF80818123B7FC160123B804AB8F0023', 'FF80818123B7FC160123B804AB900028', 'FF80818123B7FC160123B804AB950032', 'FF80818123B7FC160123B804AB98003C', 'FF80818123B7FC160123B804AB98003E', 'FF80818123B7FC160123B804AB9A0042', 'FF80818123B7FC160123B804AB9A0043', 'FF80818123B7FC160123B804AB9D004D', 'FF80818123B7FC160123B804ABA9005D', 'FF80818123B7FC160123B804ABA9005E', 'FF80818123B7FC160123B804ABAA005F')
